Articles.Content:
I never did post a hello to the community when i signed up; but after my account disappearing in the april purge disaster, i thought it'd be a great opportunity to say hey

This is a fantastic game, and actually the first one in a while i've felt the urge to try and be active in the game's community; Dev team seems great, as do most people knocking about on the forums, so i'd just like to say thanks for being such a fantastic and welcoming community.

and now i feel ive used the word "community" too often, but searching synonyms didnt help :/
Hello friend. May your parachutes hold strong, and your landing gear never break.
